snippet: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova was ousted from the quarterfinals of the Open GDF Suez in Paris, beaten by Angelique Kerber of Germany, 6-4, 6-4.
abstract: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova is ousted from the quarterfinals of the Open GDF Suez in Paris by Angelique Kerber; other tennis results noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova was ousted from the quarterfinals of the Open GDF Suez in Paris, beaten by Angelique Kerber of Germany, 6-4, 6-4.
